name: Healing Journey of Recovery
description: Licensed Professional Clinical Counselor practice specializing in mental health counseling, substance abuse treatment, and sexual addiction therapy. Services include individual, couples, and family counseling for grief, trauma, anxiety, depression, addiction, codependency, and relationship issues. Certified Sexual Addiction Therapist (CSAT) trained under Patrick Carnes PhD. Offers sliding scale fees and accepts cash and check payments. Christian worldview while respecting individual value systems.
source: Verified from Psychology Today profile and cross-referenced with multiple sources
notes: Verified information from Psychology Today profile (https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/therapists/healing-journey-of-recovery-london-ky/71470) and Laurel County Electronic Resource Guide. Practitioner: Janice Grentz, MA, LPCC, NCC, CSAT. Licensed by State of Kentucky (105772). Specializes in sexual addiction, family conflict, and relationship issues. Offers free 15-minute consultation. Member of American Association of Christian Counselors, Society for the Advancement of Sexual Health, and International Institute of Trauma and Addictions Professionals. Verified by Psychology Today.
